channel.description: Recent content in Musics on thehalfspace

item.title: My music and audio gear
item.description: These are not sponsored. I am just trying to create content for my website. I am trying to write about the budget home recording setup that I have here. WIP, this may be incomplete if you see it now. Check out some recordings I did with these setup here.

item.title: Start here
item.description: I started out as an amateur bedroom guitarist in high school and now I’m getting a little more into audio recording and music production, still in the bedroom. Unlike the typical bedroom music studio where people convert their spare bedroom into a mini music studio, my bedroom studio is my actual bedroom where I sleep and make music, and also work (during covid). Here are some of my amateur(ish) incomplete demos:
